metadata.title: CVE-2022-42309 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Xenstore: Guests can crash xenstored Due to a bug in the fix of XSA-115 amalicious guest can cause xenstored to use a wrong pointer during nodecreation in an error path, resulting in a crash of xenstored or a memorycorruption in xenstored causing further damage. Entering the error path canbe controlled by the guest e.g. by exceeding the quota value of maximumnodes per domain.

criterions.comment: xen: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
